function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 impact on education and training, leading to cancellations and reliance on online technology","Impact":"Disruption of education and training, potential decrease in learning outcomes","Mitigation":"Invest in robust online learning platforms, provide training for effective online teaching, and offer support for students' mental health","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, video conferencing apps, mental health apps","People":"Students, teachers, academic institutions","Owner":"Academic institutions, government, technology providers"},{"Description":"Reliance on mobile technology for group counseling and health advice","Impact":"Potential lack of privacy and security for health data shared on apps","Mitigation":"Ensure encryption and secure data storage for health information shared on apps, provide clear guidelines for privacy and security when using health apps","Technologies":"Encryption, secure data storage, privacy guidelines","People":"Counselors, individuals seeking counseling, app developers","Owner":"App developers, government, health organizations"},{"Description":"Monitoring of COVID-19 patients using GPS and Bluetooth technology in smartphones","Impact":"Privacy concerns, potential misuse of location data, and tracking of individuals","Mitigation":"Implement strict privacy regulations, obtain consent for location tracking, and use anonymized data for monitoring COVID-19 patients","Technologies":"Privacy regulations, consent management, anonymization techniques","People":"COVID-19 patients, general population","Owner":"Government, technology providers, privacy regulators"}]}
